wikipedia_page.main: Christopher Jon Martin,  (15 May 1973 – 25 November 2015) was a British civil servant. He was Principal Private Secretary to the Prime Minister from 2012 to 2015.

**Chris Martin, 42, civil servant, Principal Private Secretary to the Prime Minister (2012–2015).
Scott was married to the late Chris Martin (1973–2015), a civil servant. They separated in 2011 and he later remarried. They had no children from their marriage.

#REDIRECT Chris Martin (civil servant)

On 8 January 2016, Case was announced as the next Principal Private Secretary to the Prime Minister in succession to Chris Martin who had died while in office. Case took up the appointment on 11 January 2016.
